data.title: Teresa Troup Agent Profile
meta_keywords: Teresa Troup Agent Profile - William Raveis
data.meta_description: Teresa Troup Agent Profile - William Raveis, real estate
data.text:
Personal

Hi I'm Teresa Troup and I'd love to assist you. I have built a reputation of honesty and integrity, and will always work with your interests in mind. You can depend on me to give you honest and professional advice. My number one goal is to listen to your needs and make your transaction as smooth as possible. Whether you're in the research phase at the beginning of your real estate search or you know exactly what you are looking for, you'll benefit from having a real estate professional by your side. Want an agent who'll really listen to what you want in a home? Need an agent who knows how to effectively market your home so it sells? Give me a call! I'm eager to help and would love to talk to you. I was born and raised in Pennsylvania. I have been a resident of Connecticut since 1983. I have lived in North Haven, Wallingford, and currently reside in West Haven. I have 2 grown children, 2 grandchildren and a rescue dog.

Achievements

I have been named in Connecticut Magazine as one of Connecticut's Top Realtors for 2011,2012,2014-2022 West Haven Chamber of Commerce Community Service Award.

Professional Association

National Association of Realtors Greater New Haven Association of Realtors Connecticut Association of Realtors CHP-Certified Homeownership Professional

Education

Real Estate License - Greater New Haven Real Estate School

Experience

I have been a licensed real estate agent since 2007 and achieved my Brokers License in 2021. I work with buyers, sellers and investors and strive to make your transaction as smooth as possible. I will give you the customer service that you expect, and deserve along with strong negotiating skills to bring buyers and sellers together.

Areas Covered

I cover all of New Haven County including the Shoreline,and Upper Fairfield County.

Teresa Troup was extremely helpful in identifying possible buyers. She listened to and addressed all our questions and concerns. Teresa was professional, caring of the situation and always responded promptly. I have already recommended her to a friend. Thank you so very much, Teresa.
